Jinalay

Pathshala Program

Nurturing young minds with Jain values, philosophy, and cultural heritage

About Our Pathshala

Our Pathshala program is designed to provide comprehensive Jain education from childhood through young adulthood. Each level builds upon the previous, creating a strong foundation in Jain principles, philosophy, and practices.

Level 1

5-7 years

Foundation Level

Introduction to Jain principles and basic prayers

1 hour per session
15 students enrolled
View Details

Level 2

8-9 years

Elementary Level

Stories of Tirthankaras and basic Jain history

1.5 hours per session
18 students enrolled
View Details

Level 3

10-11 years

Intermediate Level

Understanding of Five Vratas and Jain philosophy

1.5 hours per session
20 students enrolled
View Details

Level 4

12-13 years

Advanced Basics

Deeper study of Jain scriptures and practices

2 hours per session
16 students enrolled
View Details

Level 5

14-15 years

Philosophy Level

Advanced Jain philosophy and ethical discussions

2 hours per session
12 students enrolled
View Details

Level 6

16-17 years

Leadership Level

Training for community leadership and service

2 hours per session
8 students enrolled
View Details

Level 7

18+ years

Advanced Studies

In-depth scripture study and teaching preparation

2.5 hours per session
6 students enrolled
View Details

Comprehensive Curriculum

Age-appropriate lessons covering Jain philosophy, history, and practices

Experienced Teachers

Dedicated volunteer teachers with deep knowledge of Jain traditions

Cultural Activities

Festivals, competitions, and cultural programs to enhance learning

Registration Information

Join our Pathsala program and give your child the gift of Jain education
